Row.Text: Pre War Knowledge
Allows trading of Open Borders and building bridges over rivers.
[NEWLINE]"Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win"[NEWLINE]- Sun Tzu, The Art of War
Way of Chi
Allows you to build the Market, a economic building.
"To all things there is an energy, awaiting release."
Bushido
Allows you to build the Sword School, enabling you to recruit katana samurai.
"The way of the warrior is the resolute acceptance of death."
Todofuken
Enables the construction of a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rice Exchange[ENDCOLOR], increasing the [ICON_GOLD] Gold output of your cities.
"When people are ruled wisely they seldom realise it, or are grateful, until wisdom is gone."
Zen
Not yet implemented.
"The gardener is but a dream of the garden."
Strategy of Attack
Build siege units.
"Without decisive attack, defence alone will not bring victory."
Strategy of Defense
Better fortifications.
"Without resolute defence, attack alone will never achieve victory."
Sojutsu
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Yari Samurai[ENDCOLOR], a powerful anti-Mounted Melee unit.
"The pointy end! Use the POINTY end!"
Way of the Sea
Allows you to build better warships.
"Wisdom lies in keeping the water on the outside."
Naval Expertise
Allows you to build better warships.
"To read wind, waves, tide and sky is to know how much there is still to know."
Kyujutsu
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bow Samurai[ENDCOLOR], a more powerful Archer unit..
"Archery is the art of letting the arrow go; it flies without thought."
Kenjutsu
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]No-Dachi Samurai[ENDCOLOR], a powerful and aggressive Melee Unit.
"When warrior and sword are one, they are invincible."
Essence of the Spirit
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warrior Monks[ENDCOLOR], a powerful and aggressive Melee Unit available to Buddhist Clans.
"The body draws its strength from the cleansed soul."
School of Shinobi

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ninja[ENDCOLOR], a powerful hidden assassin. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Criminal Syndicate[ENDCOLOR], increasing [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
"Schooling in the hidden arts benefits those who walk in shadows, and their masters."
Form

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Yari Cavalry[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bow Cavalry[ENDCOLOR], powerful Mounted Units. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warhorse Stables[ENDCOLOR], enabling construction of these units.
"Complication is ruination: function and form are one."
